snippet.title: Explorable Forest Valley made in Unreal Engine 4 (free download)
snippet.description:
https://www.instagr.am/cavesrd
free download on itch.io: https://cavesrd.itch.io/forestvalley

My first larger project created in unreal engine 4, I designed it to be fully explorable in first person so anyone can download the scene and have a walk around. Learning unreal engine 4 has proven a challenge but the process has been exiting and rewarding. I've found that this video is almost exactly how I had envisioned the scene before I started building it. as I continue to familiarize myself with ue4 hopefully i'll be able to make scenes like this a lot faster.

stay updated - https://instagr.am/cavesrd
download my other exploration games - https://cavesrd.itch.io

song used: 'two followed' by boxwork
http://weareyoungbloods.com/album/singular-forms-2

Assets used to make this scene (available on the unreal marketplace)
Kite Demo assets
Quixel Megascans free materials
Ultra Dynamic Sky
River Water Tool with flow buoyancy 
Falling Leaves vfx pack
